price: Na wameishika miungu mingine badala ya Mwenyezi Mungu ili ati wapate kusaidiwa!
arabic: وَٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ءَالِهَةٗ لَّعَلَّهُمۡ يُنصَرُونَ
footnotes: Na washirikina wamefanya miungu mingine badala ya Mwenyezi Mungu wakiwaabudu kwa kutaraji kuwa ati watawasaidia.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-ittakhadhū min dūni al-lahi ālihatan laʿallahum yunṣarūna
